demolition

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class used to store and handle all data and functions relevant to handling the current state of the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Bomb> bombs
      List of all bombs.
      int currentLevel
      The current level in the game.
      java.util.List<Character> enemies
      List of all enemies.
      java.util.List<Explosion> explosions
      List of all explosions.
      boolean gameEnded
      Whether the game has been concluded.
      Coordinates goalCoords
      The coordinates of the goal in the level map, stored for convenience.
      Tile[][] levelMap
      The current level map, using the Tile enumerator.
      Player player
      The Player object.
      int timeLeft
      The time remaining in the current level (before the player dies).

      GameState()
      Constructs the new GameState object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState()
        Constructs the new GameState object. Sets the current level to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseLevelMap

        public Tile[][] initialiseLevelMap(Setup setup,
                                   GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler,
                                   java.lang.String filePathExtension)
        Initialises the level map. This involves reading the level file and storing its relevant data in a new Tile array as well as adding to the Player object and List of enemies already existing in GameState. If the specified level file is not found, an empty map is instead generated.
        Parameters:
        setup - The Setup object used in the app.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        filePathExtension - A prefix to add to the level file path. Only used in testing.
        Returns:
        A new Tile array representing a level map.

      • updateAllEntities

        public boolean updateAllEntities()
        Updates all entities in the game.
        Returns:
        Whether the player now occupies the same tile as an enemy or explosion.

      • updateEnemies

        public boolean updateEnemies()
        Updates all enemies in the game.
        Returns:
        Whether at least one enemy has moved into a tile with the Player.

      • updateBombs

        public boolean updateBombs()
        Updates all bombs in the game, including exploding them.
        Returns:
        Whether the updating was successful.

      • updateExplosions

        public boolean updateExplosions()
        Updates all explosions in the game.
        Returns:
        Whether the player now occupies the same tile as the Player.

      • checkExplosionKill

        public boolean checkExplosionKill(Explosion explosion)
        Handles the collision of an explosion with Characters in order to kill them.
        Parameters:
        explosion - The explosion object to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether the explosion has killed the Player.

      • checkEnemyKill

        public boolean checkEnemyKill(Character enemy)
        Check whether a given enemy has killed the Player.
        Parameters:
        enemy - The enemy to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the enemy occupies the same tile as the Player.

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin(Setup setup,
                        GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler)
        Check whether the player has won a level, and if so, performs the relevant tasks.
        Parameters:
        setup - The Setup object used in the app.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        Returns:
        Whether the final level has been won by the Player.

      • resetLevel

        public void resetLevel(Setup setup,
                       GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler)
        Resets the level by clearing all entities, then re-initialising the map.
        Parameters:
        setup - The Setup object used in the app.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.

      • checkLoss

        public boolean checkLoss(Setup setup,
                         GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler)
        Checks whether the player has lost, and if so, performs the relevant tasks.
        Parameters:
        setup - The Setup object used in the app.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        Returns:
        Whether the level has been lost.

      • doLoss

        public boolean doLoss(Setup setup,
                      GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler)
        Performs the loss, either by resetting the level or displaying a game over.
        Parameters:
        setup - The Setup object used in the app.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        Returns:
        Whether the player has run out of lives, resulting in a game over.
